location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 6/54 Correspondence regarding Grant of Monopoly for Printing Press in Bahrain'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains two letters from Kaiyumbhoy Casumji to the Political Agent in Bahrain, Lieutenant-Colonel Percy Gordon Loch, requesting an interview to discuss a monopoly for a printing press granted to him by the Government of Bahrain.Also included in the file (folios 4-5) are internal office notes in which the legitimacy of the monopoly is discussed and whether any action needs to be taken by the Agency.
